name: Ladce - DEMO
description:
This demo includes one level from my WIP game - Ladce. Ladce is futuristic cartoon FPS shooter inspired by old school classics like Half-Life or Killzone. You are in role of Cooper - professional marine trying to stop alien invasion.

Shoot your way through dozens of enemies. Try to recover hard drive with important information and stay alive!

Try the demo and leave feedback for the future!
